title: Devi Lakshmi Temple Haaram - Divine Elegance
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Features a radiant Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: Intricate Temple design featuring a central Goddess Lakshmi motif, embodying prosperity and blessings. Embellished with meticulously set CZ diamonds in a pavé setting, complemented by vibrant Ruby and Emerald gemstones. The neckpiece is adorned with delicate freshwater pearls along its curve, adding a touch of softness. Features traditional South Indian floral motifs throughout.
occasions: and significant life events like Seemantham (సీమంతం). Suitable as a statement piece for sophisticated evening wear.
description: Authentic South Indian Temple jewelry design. Exquisite craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty. The Lakshmi motif symbolizes prosperity and good fortune. Perfectly blends traditional aesthetics with a modern sensibility for versatile wear. A valuable heirloom piece to be treasured for generations.
